TopicTitle: Why is Console so far behind in updates?

Articles.Content: I understand another company ports the game but cant you tell us anything about next updates? Its been a while now. Can you ask them for us?

well it's ported over by blitworks and an update usually takes 12 to 18 month to arrive on console (far to long in my opinion for a usually less than a gig update file ) anyway that's about the extent of what I know hope this was helpfull
